name: dreamlive-pro
description: Dream Live Pro - Maid Cafe Performance Controller

scripts.electron:dev: concurrently "BROWSER=none npm start" "sleep 15 && NODE_ENV=development npx electron ."
scripts.electron:build: npm run build && cp electron.js build/ && cp preload.js build/ && node -e "const pkg=require('./package.json');pkg.main='build/electron.js';require('fs').writeFileSync('package.json',JSON.stringify(pkg,null,2))" && electron-builder && node -e "const pkg=require('./package.json');pkg.main='electron.js';require('fs').writeFileSync('package.json',JSON.stringify(pkg,null,2))"
scripts.electron:build-win: npm run build && cp electron.js build/ && cp preload.js build/ && node -e "const pkg=require('./package.json');pkg.main='build/electron.js';require('fs').writeFileSync('package.json',JSON.stringify(pkg,null,2))" && electron-builder --win && node -e "const pkg=require('./package.json');pkg.main='electron.js';require('fs').writeFileSync('package.json',JSON.stringify(pkg,null,2))"
scripts.electron:build-mac: npm run build && cp electron.js build/ && cp preload.js build/ && node -e "const pkg=require('./package.json');pkg.main='build/electron.js';require('fs').writeFileSync('package.json',JSON.stringify(pkg,null,2))" && electron-builder --mac && node -e "const pkg=require('./package.json');pkg.main='electron.js';require('fs').writeFileSync('package.json',JSON.stringify(pkg,null,2))"
scripts.cap:sync: npm run build && npx cap sync ios

author: Dream Live
